data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Darkwoulfe's Token Pack Volume 19
data.detailed_description:
Darkwoulfe's Token Pack volume 19


Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 26 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Barbarian of the Southern Marches
  • Crysmal
  • Demi Lich
  • Dragonborn Barbarian
  • Eye-Horror Ice-Realm
  • Eye-Horror Mauve
  • Eye-Horror Mossy
  • Eye-Horror Purple Test
  • Gargoyle 1 Lrg
  • Gargoyle 2 Lrg
  • Gargoyle Statue
  • Gnomish Rogue
  • Golden Warrior
  • Half-Orc Avenger
  • Heinrich Loquesmith
  • Helgagilden Pennypouch Attacking
  • Hill Giant with Axe
  • Hill Giant with Club
  • Hill Giantess with Club
  • Manticore
  • Merisse Truestrike
  • Northerner with Axe
  • Quest Knight
  • Sea Hag
  • Tiefling Caster
  • Warrior with Medium Armor and Shield

Requires: An active subscription or a Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license and any Ruleset.

Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 26 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
